across chunky weight 6 5 cm / 2½ inches across abbreviations k knit p purl st s stitch es construction as the air turns crisp and the leaves begin to fall there s nothing quite like bringing the warmth of autumn into your home with a handmade touch these adorable knitted pumpkins are the perfect cosy project for those quiet evenings by the fire or a rainy afternoon with a cup of tea in hand whether you re a beginner or an experienced knitter this pattern offers a versatile and fun way to create your own seasonal décor you can choose to knit your pumpkin flat or in the round whatever feels best to you with the flexibility to use any weight yarn from light and delicate to thick and chunky you can truly make each pumpkin your own you can even hold two yarns together to create a rich marled effect or a thicker squishy fabric the possibilities are endless so feel free to get creative with colours textures and sizes let s get started on filling your home with handmade charm this
